Hello!
I am here to help you find a movie trailer you will like.
Do you know what kind of movie trailer you are interested in watching?
I think I'd like a comedy.
OK!
There are a lot of great comedy trailers out right now.
Do you have any particular actors/actresses you want to see, or do you want to be surprised?
I want to be surprised!
Let me ask just a few more questions to help find something unique you will enjoy.
What are some of your favorite comedies?
I like Monty Python and the Holy Grail a lot.
That's definitely a classic, and one of my personal favorites as well.
Sounds like you appreciate movies that are witty as well as goofy.
Yes, I think that's a good assessment of my taste!
I think British humor is often distinctly unique when compared to the popular sensibilities of other regions.
Would you prefer to watch another British film, or do you have no preference for where the movie was made?
I have no preference really.
Alright.
Let me pull up some recommendations for you.
Thank you!
As I give you recommendations, please feel free to give me feedback on how you feel about my suggestions!
If you don't like the sound of a movie, or find the description incredibly appealing, let me know - it will help me calibrate to your tastes and hopefully find you some great trailers you will like!
Thank you so much for your help!
OK - my first recommendation is Being John Malkovich.
It's set in current day, and definitely incorporates a surreal element.
The premise is that John Cusack finds a portal that leads him into the mind of movie star John Malkovich - who plays a dramatized version of himself.
He does a great job and seems to have a lot of fun with the role.
It was nominated for three Oscars.
That sounds really interesting, I like the surreal elements.
So would you like to watch this movie trailer?
Yes, I think so!
Wonderful.
I really hope you enjoy it!
(I'm probably going to watch it again tonight, I haven't seen it in a while and bringing it up reminded me how much I liked it!)
Thank you for the recommendation!
I am really looking forward to watching, and appreciate your awesome recommendation!
